topic.title: The Sure
topic.body:
To My Surer:
1.Burning The World, To Be Sure.
2.Do not eat medicine, Do not go to hospital, Do not take any test.
3.When you meet your brother of Sure, Do not take any electronic set.
4.Do not eat any things only few people could get.
5.Do not trust any body not of Sure, Trust Your Master.
6.Do not fake your brother of Sure, otherwise Cut you into parts.
Following the Six Rules, you will be far away from diseases and hurt. You will be health. And we will
burning all of the evil of world！

1517638428_1KAKF4nVCWqJbrVPWxFvRNuU1zLkw.body:
> [balancer73](#comment_7_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): Ancient Chinese instructions [...]

are you chinese?
So join the Sure, broadcast the thought of Sure to other people. It would be helpful.

1516525953_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5f.body:
coolplay › helium: Russians maybe bow to China, is it a joke? No, I don't think so. There are evil living in China, much more. Russia government are learning from China how to control people, kill people. 自杀不能反抗，然而传播自杀的思想可以反抗，如果所有人宁可自杀也不接受奴役，他们就没有人来奴役。所以我们应该宣传不接受奴役，宁可毁灭也不可

coolplay › http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AF7hT9ba8gQA6oXmswRqmvbABtqpJuXfC The world is falling, we need to burning the world.
